description: These Merino tees may look like any other T-shirt, but it is built from ultra-fine 100% Merion wool threads that is smooth and silky soft to the touch, making it an easy choice to wear all day. Merino wool is a complete must for the winter season, and more people are discovering that the same reasons make merino wool perfect for hiking too: It ?s breathable, moisture-wicking, odour-resistant and regulates temperature. All tees made to make your adventures even greater. Try them out and thank us later.
name: Devold Smorskredtind Merino 150 Tee - Mens
